description:
The Tendoushuu are a group of Amanto that not only control large parts of Gintama`s universe but are the true rulers of Earth with their main base of operations in Edo, Japan. The series establishes early on that they are the main villains in the story who influenced many of the actions and lives of most protagonists and antagonists.
Source: http://gintama.fandom.com/wiki/Tendoshu
name: Tendoushuu
